title: How  to set and use the quick dialing function?
answer:
Setting: Enter Main Menu – Address Book – Quick Dialing, and select keys 2 to 9 to perform the setting and enter the numbers for the quick dialing.
Operation: Set a number to be a quick dialing number. In the standby state, press keys 2 to 9 and then press the Dial key (or long-press keys 2 to 9 in the standby state) to dial the corresponding number.
